messages.content: TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Trump says meeting with Mexican President Enrique Pena Nieto would have been fruitless. Trump wants to build a wall on the southern border of the United States. He says Mexico will pay for it but Mexico insists it will not.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. President Donald Trump said on Thursday he would strike numerous bilateral trade deals. They would include clauses to allow a 30-day termination notice, he said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The White House said it would look for an opportunity to reschedule the meeting. The meeting was supposed to take place next week.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The outgoing administration in coordination with the incoming one had requested all politically appointed officers submit letters of resignation. Some will continue in the Foreign Service in other positions and others will retire by choice or because they have exceeded the time limits of their grade in service.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

A possible cancellation of a meeting planned next week would fuel uncertainty, finance minister says. Trump said on Twitter Pena Nieto should cancel his visit to Washington if Mexico refuses to pay for a border wall.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Cheryl LaFleur has been a member of the commission since 2010. She has served as the acting chairman before, from November 2013 to July 2014.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Mexican Economy Minister Ildefonso Guajardo held talks with Trump trade adviser Peter Navarro. The talks had shown the U.S. side was receptive to what Mexico had to say, he said. The pair discussed how to modernize the NAFTA trade agreement sensibly.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Mexican President Enrique Pena Nieto says he regrets and disapproves the push by U.S. President Donald Trump to build a new wall. The new American leader issued an executive order earlier in the day aiming to speed the construction of the wall.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trump said he will absolutely do safe zones in Syria to protect people fleeing violence there. I think that Europe has made a tremendous mistake by allowing these millions of people to go into Germany and various other countries, he said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. President Donald Trump says illegal immigrants should not be worried about deportation. Trump: "I do have a big heart. Were going to take care of everybody"
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The following bullet points are from the U.S. President Donald Trumps Twitter accounts (@realDonaldTrump and @POTUS). Reuters has not edited the tweets. @realDonaldTrump : -- Source link: bit.ly/2jpy49U; bit.LY/2jpEXYR
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. House Speaker Paul Ryan says an investigation is the right thing to do. President Donald Trump said he would seek an investigation into what he believes was voter fraud in the November election.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The black sites were used to detain suspects captured in President George W. Bush's war on terrorism after the Sept. 11, 2001, attacks. They were formally closed by President Barack Obama.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Speaker Paul Ryan said the House would fund a wall President Donald Trump wants to build along the U.S.-Mexico border. Ryan said there are a lot of different ways of getting Mexico to contribute to doing this.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The executive orders would also begin a process to review and potentially abrogate certain forms of multilateral treaties, the Times reported.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. President Donald Trump says he feels waterboarding works as an intelligence-gathering tool. He said he would defer to his Cabinet on whether to use the illegal technique.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trump said he expects construction of a U.S.-Mexico border wall to start within months. Trump told the television network that Mexico would ultimately pay for it, adding that negotiations for the reimbursement would start relatively soon.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The White House denied on Wednesday that the new Trump administration ordered a curb on the flow of information from several government agencies. White House spokesman Sean Spicer said employees have been told to adhere to their agencys own policies.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

A draft order calling for a review of whether a defunct CIA program to interrogate terrorist suspects in secret overseas black site prisons should be revived is not a White House document, White House says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

President Donald Trump will sign two executive orders on Wednesday. One focuses on border security and the intent to build a wall along the U.S. southern border. Another focuses on enforcement of immigration laws.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

British Prime Minister Theresa May says any trade deal with the U.S. would put British interests and values first. Speaking in parliament, May said her meeting with Donald Trump later this week was a sign of the strength of the special relationship between the two countries.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Sen. Chuck Schumer, the top Democrat in the U.S. Senate, urged Republican President Donald Trump on Tuesday to declare China a currency manipulator. Treasury secretary nominee Steven Mnuchin has told senators he would work to combat currency manipulation.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Secretary of State-designate Rex Tillerson visited the State Department on Tuesday for briefings. The Senate Foreign Relations Committee voted 11-10 on Monday to approve Tillerson, a former Exxon Mobil Corp chairman.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Rep. Tom Price, a Georgia orthopedic surgeon, said nobody ought to be priced out of the market for having a bad diagnosis. He did not specify how.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Senate Democratic leader Chuck Schumer said he told President Donald Trump in a White House meeting on Tuesday. Trump said on Tuesday he would announce his Supreme Court pick next week. The lifetime appointment as a Supreme Court justice requires Senate confirmation.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Senate Republican leader Mitch McConnell says he will meet with President Donald Trump later on Tuesday to discuss his Supreme Court pick. McConnell said he expected the nominee to be highly qualified and conservative.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trump on Tuesday signed an executive order directing that the permitting process and regulatory burden for domestic manufacturers should be streamlined. Among a total of five actions signed by Trump in an Oval Office ceremony, he also signed orders to expedite environmental review.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The Standing Rock Sioux tribe in a statement on Tuesday said it opposed U.S. President Donald Trumps executive order that would allow the Dakota Access Pipeline to move forward. The tribe said the $3.8 billion project would contaminate the tribe's water supply.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. House of Representatives Speaker Paul Ryan says he has invited President Donald Trump to address a joint session of Congress on Feb. 28. This will be an opportunity for the people and their representatives to hear directly from our new president about his vision in our shared agenda, Ryan said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The endorsement by the Senate Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs cleared the way for a full Senate vote. Carson, 65, promised senators on the committee during a confirmation hearing that he would monitor any potential conflicts of interest.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The Senate energy committee said late Monday it had delayed until further notice a meeting on Tuesday. The panel had been slated to vote on President Donald Trumps nominee for secretary of the interior, Ryan Zinke.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Finance Minister Taro Aso says arrangements are being made for Prime Minister Shinzo Abe to visit the United States. Aso told reporters after a cabinet meeting that it was undecided who would accompany the premier.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Japan will continue to stress the strategic and economic importance of the Trans-Pacific Partnership trade deal. Trade minister Hiroshige Seko said it would be important for the TPP to have the United States as a member. Seko also said he would closely monitor the impact on Japanese corporations if there were any changes made to the North American Free Trade Agreement.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The planned visit by Trump son-in-law Jared Kushner had hit logistical problems. A separate source had earlier said Kushner intended to meet Trudeau aides on the margins of a cabinet retreat.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

President Donald Trump met with key business leaders on Monday. He signed an executive order withdrawing the United States from the Trans-Pacific Partnership. White House spokesman: Trump would move away from multilateral trade policies.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
President Donald Trump said he would renegotiate the North American Free Trade Agreement at the appropriate time. Trumps remarks came at the start of a meeting with union leaders.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. President Donald Trump will discuss ways to expand trade with Britain. British Prime Minister Theresa May meets with him at the White House on Friday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trump will announce a nominee in the next couple of weeks. Earlier this month Trump said he would pick from among 20 candidates. Justice Antonin Scalia died in February last year.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. President Donald Trump has resigned from the Trump Organization. His sons Don Jr. and Eric are in charge of the business, White House says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
White House spokesman Sean Spicer defended his statement that President Donald Trumps inauguration was the most-watched ever. Spicer had been sharply criticized for his comments on Saturday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The White House said on Monday it planned later this week to establish four Skype seats for its regular media briefings to allow news organizations outside of Washington to participate.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Business leaders will return in 30 days with a series of actions to help U.S. manufacturing, Dow Chemical CEO Andrew Liveris says. The conversation honed in on tax, regulatory and trade.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trump says a lawsuit accusing him of violating the Constitution is without merit. His remarks to reporters in the Oval Office coincided with a letter by Democratic lawmakers. The letter asked the General Services Administration what it was doing about Trumps hotel lease for the Old Post Office.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

President Donald Trump signed an executive order formally withdrawing the United States from the 12-nation Trans-Pacific Partnership trade deal. Trump also signed an order imposing a federal hiring freeze and a directive banning U.S. non-governmental organizations from providing abortions abroad.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Republican Senator Marco Rubio says he will vote to back President Donald Trumps nominee for secretary of state, Rex Tillerson. Despite my reservations, I will support Mr. Tillersons nomination in committee and in the full Senate.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Heather Wilson is a graduate of the U.S. Air Force Academy. She has been President of the South Dakota School of Mines & Technology since 2013.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. President Donald Trump was scheduled to speak with Egyptian President Abdel Fattah al-Sisi.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Top adviser to U.S. President Donald Trump plans to hold talks in Canada. Jared Kushner, Trumps son-in-law, will travel to Calgary, Alberta, on Tuesday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Hungarian PM Viktor Orban says EU should seek a new deal with the United States. Orban also told an economic conference that Europe should let go of the illusion of federalism.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Kremlin expects to soon agree a date for the first phone call between President Vladimir Putin and U.S. President Donald Trump. Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said contacts between Moscow and Washington about the date of the first call were being handled by the Russian Foreign Ministry.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President Donald Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin see eye to eye when it comes to many foreign policy goals. Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov was speaking at a news conference with his Hungarian counterpart Peter Szijjarto.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Netanyahu: "Many matters face us, the Israeli-Palestinian issue, the situation in Syria, the Iranian threat" White House later said the conversation would take place at 13:30 ET.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

New U.S. President Donald Trump will speak by telephone with Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu. Trump, who was sworn in on Friday, has criticized former President Barack Obamas policies toward Israel.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. President Donald Trump tells CIA officers he has great respect for the agency. In his first official visit to a government agency as president, Trump was effusive with his praise.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The Trump administration condemned what it called the anti-police atmosphere in America. It called for more law enforcement and more effective policing in a statement.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Donald Trump sends his Cabinet nominations to the Senate. He also calls for a national day of patriotism. Trump also signed into a law a waiver to allow James Mattis to serve.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The U.S. Senate voted overwhelmingly to approve retired Marine General John Kelly as Secretary of Homeland Security. Eighty-eight senators approved Kelly and just 11 opposed him.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Ajit Pai is a Republican member of the Federal Communications Commission. Pai has dissented from the decisions of Democrats on the FCC that supported net neutrality.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Violent protests against Donald Trumps presidential inauguration on Friday were mostly under control. About 95 people had been arrested, the head of the citys police force said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Interim Chief of Police Peter Newsham says 90 people have been arrested. He says the violent group consisted of a couple  hundred protesters. Thousands of others are peacefully demonstrating elsewhere across the capital city.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Protesters and police clash just blocks from the parade route and the White House. More than 90 people have been arrested so far in protests.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Washington police made numerous arrests on Friday after violent protests during Donald Trumps inauguration. Pepper spray and other control devices were used to control the criminal actors and protect persons and property.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The following bullet points are from the U.S. President-Elect Donald Trumps Twitter account. Reuters has not edited the tweets.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Senior Mexican officials will hold meetings on January 25 and 26 with U.S. President-Elect Donald Trumps. The meetings will discuss bilateral relations such as security, trade and migration, the government said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. Treasury would recommend China be considered a currency manipulator. President-elect Donald Trumps nominee to run the Treasury department, Steven Mnuchin, said on Thursday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry is set to step down and depart the State Department. The Senate Foreign Relations Committee is expected to vote as soon as Monday to approve Tillerson as new secretary of state.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Donald Trump says Jets owner Woody Johnson will be U.S. ambassador to St. James. Trump referred to Johnson, owner of the New York Jets, as ambassador during remarks.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Treasury Secretary nominee Steven Mnuchin said it was important to maintain a strong dollar in the long term. Mnuchin added that President-elect Donald Trumps recent comments that the currency was too strong were focused on short-term impacts.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Treasury will enforce all sanctions against Russia unless a deal were reached. President-elect Donald Trumps nominee to run the department said on Thursday. Treasury Secretary nominee Steven Mnuchin said: 100 percent so.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

President-elect Donald Trump has asked 50 government employees in critical posts to stay on in his administration. Deputy Defense Secretary Robert Work and Brett McGurk, the U.S. envoy for countering Islamic State are among them.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

A spokesman for President-elect Donald Trump accused Democratic Senate leader Chuck Schumer of stalling tactics. Schumer should recognize that this is more about continuity of government and ensuring that these qualified individuals get voted on as soon as possible.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Kevin Hassett is an economist at the American Enterprise Institute. He is being eyed as a potential chairman of the White House Council of Economic Advisers.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The White House announced the policy change last week. It had enabled Cubans who fled to the United States to pursue residency if they reached the mainland.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Former U.S. President George H.W. Bush has been moved to an intensive-care unit at a Houston hospital. His wife, former first lady Barbara Bush, also was admitted to the same hospital on Wednesday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Nikki Haley, U.S. President-elect Donald Trumps nominee for ambassador to the United Nations, said it would be better to carefully review the 2015 Iran nuclear deal. If we find that there are violations that we act on those violations, Haley told lawmakers at her Senate confirmation hearing.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Donald Trumps spokesman says his team will brief the media on Thursday in Washington. The Republican U.S. president-elect is sworn into office on Friday.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

New York Governor Andrew Cuomo said he discussed the dramatic impact that some budget proposals being considered in Washington would have on New Yorkers. Ending the Affordable Care Act, he said, would leave 3 million New Yorkers without health insurance.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Nikki Haley, President-elect Donald Trumps nominee for U.S. ambassador to the United Nations, told lawmakers. We should stand up to any country that attempts to interfere with our system, she said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Donald Trump may take four or five executive actions on Friday, spokesman says. Spokesman Sean Spicer did not elaborate. Trump had promised to take executive actions immediately after taking office.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. cannot trust Russia and must see positive actions by Russia before easing sanctions, Nikki Haley says. Russia is trying to show their muscle right now. And I think we always have to be cautious.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Germany wants to reach out to the future U.S. administration under President-elect Donald Trump. Chancellor Angela Merkels foreign policy advisor Christoph Heusgen said Germany would have to shoulder more international responsibilities in future. He said Germany will steadily increase military spending towards the NATO goal of 2 percent of gross domestic product.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The press conference will be held at 2:15 ET (19:15 GMT) Obama is set to leave office on Friday when he will be succeeded by Donald Trump.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The move comes days before U.S. President Barack Obama hands over power to Donald Trump. The move was long-planned, State Department spokesman John Kirby said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
White House spokesman Josh Earnest said he could not rule out such a move. Oman announced that it had taken in 10 prisoners released from the facility.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. President-elect Donald Trump continued to hold meetings in New York on Tuesday. The following is a list of confirmed meetings for Tuesday, according to Trumps transition team.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Boeing CEO Dennis Muilenburg says he had a very productive meeting with President-elect Donald Trump. He said he was encouraged by progress in talks on the Air Force One replacement fleet and on fighter planes.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President-elect Donald Trump said in a newspaper interview he believed other countries would leave the EU after Britain. I think we Europeans have our fate in our own hands, German Chancellor Angela Merkel said.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President-elect Donald Trump said NATO was obsolete because it had not defended against terror attacks. But he said the military alliance was still very important to him. Trump added that many NATO members were not paying their fair share.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Foreign ministers from NATO and European Union nations are concerned about comments on NATO. U.S. President-elect Donald Trump made the comments in a newspaper interview. In the interview, Trump said he viewed NATO as obsolete.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Angela Merkel working to set a date this spring for a meeting with Donald Trump. Merkel had offered to meet Trump in the United States in her capacity as chairman of the Group of 20 leading economies. The chancellor has spoken with Trump only once, shortly after his election.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

BMW will stick to plans to open a Mexican plant in 2019, an executive says. U.S. President-elect Donald Trump has warned of a border tax on German cars made in Mexico. The new Mexican plant would build the BMW 3 Series starting from 2019.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Germany still regards the TTIP EU-U.S. free-trade deal as an important project. Government spokesman Steffen Seibert believes it is in both European and U.s. interests to continue negotiations. President-elect Donald Trump has opposed the Transatlantic trade deal.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Republican Senator Rand Paul says Obamacare replacement bill would get rid of some of the mandates for health insurance coverage. Paul also said his proposal would overhaul healthcare regulations.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Outgoing President Barack Obama will hold his final news conference as U.S. leader on the afternoon of Wednesday, Jan. 18. He offered no specific time for the event.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

President-elect Donald Trumpplans to nominate Rod Rosenstein for deputy attorney general. If confirmed, Rosenstein would be in charge of any investigation into Hillary Clinton. Clinton was the subject of a federal investigation into her use of a private email server.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The Senate Intelligence Committee will investigate allegations Russia used cyber attacks to influence the U.S. presidential election. The committee plans to interview senior officials of both the Trump and Obama administrations and may issue subpoenas.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

President-elect Donald Trumps national security adviser Michael Flynn spoke on the phone to the Russian ambassador to Washington. Trumps team had previously said the phone call happened on Dec. 28. Two people familiar with the issue said Flynn had several phone conversations with the ambassador on December 29.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The procedural vote of 235 to 188 clears the way for a vote later on Friday to pass the measure. It strictly followed party lines, indicating solidarity among House Republicans on the issue.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

President-elect Donald Trump and Housing Secretary-designate Ben Carson spoke with entertainer and talk show host Steve Harvey on Friday. They discussed an effort by the incoming administration to seek positive changes in U.S. inner cities.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
Eliminating Obamacare is a top priority of the Republican-majority Congress. President-elect Donald Trump has urged lawmakers to act quickly. The resolution passed by a vote of 227 to 198.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President-elect Donald Trump will meet with Lockheed Martin Corp Chief Executive officer Marillyn Hewson on Friday. Trump, who takes office next Friday, said last month he viewed costs for the aerospace companys F-35 fighter as too high.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

British Prime Minister Theresa May says the person who wrote reports has not worked for the British government for years. The author of the dossier has been named as Christopher Steele, a former MI6 officer. Steele has so far not commented.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President-elect Donald Trump on Friday accused his political opponents, both Democrats and Republicans, of putting together a dossier of unverified claims linking him to Russia. Trump said the document was probably released by intelligence agencies.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Republicans promising to repeal and replace President Barack Obamas landmark healthcare law are under no hard deadlines for producing an alternate program. House of Representatives Speaker Paul Ryan said House Republicans will have an in-depth conversation about healthcare legislation at the end of this month.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

James Mattis, President-elect Donald Trumps nominee for U.S. Secretary of Defense, said on Thursday that he had a very, very high degree of confidence in intelligence agencies. Mattis said he expects Trump to be open to his view on intelligence matters.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
The panel voted 24-3 to waive a law on civilian control of the U.S. military. The no votes came from three Democrats: Senators Richard Blumenthal, Kirsten Gillibrand and Elizabeth Warren.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The Senate voted 81 to 17 for a one-time waiver of a provision of a law on civilian control of the military. The waiver must still be approved by the House of Representatives Armed Services Committee and full House.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The panel voted 34 to 28, along party lines, for a waiver of a provision of a law on civilian control of the U.S. military. Democrats opposed the measure after Trumps transition team canceled Mattis appearance at a committee hearing.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. President-elect Donald Trump held meetings in New York on Thursday. Trump will take over the White House from President Barack Obama on Jan. 20.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. President-elect Donald Trump plans to meet with corporate executives. Meeting arranged by former New York Mayor Rudy Giuliani. Giuliani, a former Trump campaign adviser, runs a cyber security consulting business.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

James Mattis will say the U.S. must confront Russian behavior when it is contrary to the interests of the United States. Mattis, in a written response to the Senate Armed Services Committee considering his nomination, however added that he supported Trumps desire to engage with Russia.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Kremlin says it hopes President Vladimir Putin and President-elect Donald Trump will get along. Spokesman Dmitry Peskov was responding to questions about how the Kremlin assessed Trumps news conference.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

Clapper says he does not believe the U.S. intelligence community leaked a private security document. The document alleges Russian intelligence operatives have compromising information on Trump. Clapper emphasized that this document is not a U.s. Intelligence Community product.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Senate Foreign Relations Committee Chairman Bob Corker said on Wednesday he expects the Senate will confirm Rex Tillerson. Corker said he felt Tillerson had acquitted himself well in addressing senators concerns about his relationship with Russia.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Secretary of State nominee Rex Tillerson said on Wednesday that he does not agree with President-elect Donald Trumps comments that it would not be a bad thing if other countries acquired nuclear weapons.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
U.S. Secretary of State nominee Rex Tillerson called Mexico a long-standing friend of the United States. He said the United State would engage with its southern neighbor.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The White House says U.S. President-elect Donald Trump and his transition team have refused to make public information. That kind of secrecy only serves to sow public doubt, spokesman Josh Earnest says.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

U.S. Secretary of State nominee Rex Tillerson said on Wednesday he would recommend a full review of the nuclear deal with Iran. He did not call for an outright rejection of the 2015 accord. Tillerson also said he did not oppose the Trans Pacific Partnership.
True
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

White House spokesman Josh Earnest would not comment on whether a U.S. intelligence report referred to unsubstantiated allegations that Russia had compromising information on President-elect Donald Trump. Earnest said the report discussed a number of tactics employed by Moscow.
True
